data.actual_result: our current active window will become inactive and you will lose control on it until you click on other screen area
data.expected_result: It should click on the mouse position of your current active window
data.short_description: Clicking on the desktop notifications area is making your current window inactive and intercept your control on it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on desktop notifications - Choose a server to get new message notifications from it - Switch your active server tab or minimize Discord and do any other stuff like surfing the internet from your browser - When you will recieve notifications from Discord, click on the right screen area where they are popping up (not on them)
